OOC: I missed the two previous missiles so i'll say that they missed if
that okay. Also, isnt there a chance that these missiles hit Iron Raptor,
or Prowl?

BIC:

One of the missiles hit Menasor in the foot, erupting burst of fire
everywhere, the other flys up past him, (maybe towards either Prowl or Iron
Raptor, youre choice). He screams in pain, with all these rats attacking
him, as he continues to soar ever upward (he must be a good 200 feet in the
air) he fires down on cluster with his one arm that's wrist isnt damaged.
Letting loose two bursts of plasma energy.
